short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using the ChatGPTalk sidebar extension allows you to easily summarize the text of web pages using ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By opening the web page you want to summarize and pressing the 'Capture' button in the ChatGPTalk sidebar, the text of the web page is extracted and automatically pasted into the ChatGPT input field as a prompt for summarization. Furthermore, it is also possible to extract YouTube subtitles and use them as prompts for ChatGPT.


Key Features:

- ğŸ¤– ChatGPT Integration: Experience ChatGPT directly in a convenient sidebar, enhancing your browsing without switching tabs.

- ğŸ“ Text Capture: Automatically captures text from the main window and inserts it into the ChatGPT message box for quick interaction.

- ğŸ“‹ Prompt Templates: Adds a preset prompt template upon pasting, making the summarization of web content straightforward and efficient.

- ğŸ¥ YouTube Transcriptions: Seamlessly captures and pastes transcription information from YouTube videos into the ChatGPT message box, simplifying the process of engaging with video content.

- âœ‚ï¸ Intelligent Text Splitting: If the captured text exceeds a predetermined character count, it's automatically split into appropriate parts and sequentially pasted into the ChatGPT prompt box. This ensures smooth interaction with ChatGPT, even for lengthy documents.

-----------------------------

Designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind, the ChatGPTalk Sidebar extension is an essential tool for anyone looking to enhance their web browsing and content interaction through the power of ChatGPT.
